title: Rethinking our Disposable Society: how to build a circular economy
itunes:author: Dr Jason Wong, Lara Pohl-Martell, Jocelyn Blériot
description: Contributor(s): Dr Jason Wong, Lara Pohl-Martell, Jocelyn Blériot | The idea of a circular economy, in which waste and pollution are eliminated through better design, reuse of resources and regeneration, is a radical solution to climate change and biodiversity loss, as well as social problems. But is a shift away from a linear economy achievable, and how?
